name: Minigolf Mad!
description:
This Android game takes the minigolf concept and flips it on it's head! The goal of this game is to get the ball in the hole in one shot, but the course is never the same. Randomly placed obstacles along with the random ball and hole spawn combined with the random green shape makes for an ever-changing experience and one that you'll never see again.

How to play:

You get three tries to get the ball from where it starts to the hole in one shot. drag away from the ball in the direction you want it to go to shoot. Be sure to use the walls, corners and boost panels to reach the hole, avoiding the bottomless pits!
